General.Name: Adler Real Estate AG
General.Description: ADLER is one of Germany's leading residential property companies with a focus on affordable housing. Its portfolio is primarily located in " or on the outskirts of " large and growing conurbations in northern, eastern and western Germany and has considerable upside potential in terms of revaluation gains, vacancy reduction and rent uplifts. All of the Group's properties and business operations are located in Germany. The Group's residential portfolio has been built up over the past six years by acquiring individual portfolios or shares in property-holding companies.
